translations.target: Sheet1
The Boundless Emperor of the Holy Domain
Male-oriented

translations.source: 昆仑派掌门升天前留下遗嘱，托付弟子守护大夏龙脉。掌门之位为无极圣皇，拥有特殊权力。掌门弟子遭遇南苑郡主强行带走，原是师尊指腹为婚的妻子。郡主带来结婚协议和国宝紫罗丹，欲与掌门弟子成婚。双方因误会和傲慢产生冲突。掌门弟子接到家书，得知父亲重病需回家。途中遇到武林盟主女儿的比武招亲大会，其妹小慈被迫参加。比武中，各路英雄挑战，赵臣宗师突破挑战极限，最终战胜扶桑人，赢得比武招亲。
translations.target: Before ascending, the head of the Kunlun Sect left a will entrusting his disciple with the duty of guarding the Daxia dragon vein. The sect leadership is held under the title of the Wuji Sacred Emperor, which comes with special authority. The disciple is forcibly taken away by the Princess of Nanyuan—who turns out to be the betrothed wife arranged by their master before birth. The princess brings a marriage agreement and the national treasure, the Ziluo Pill, seeking to marry him. Misunderstanding and arrogance spark conflict between the two. The disciple then receives a letter from home and learns that his father is gravely ill, forcing him to return. Along the way, he encounters a martial-arts tournament held as a bridegroom-selection contest for the Martial Alliance leader’s daughter, where his younger sister, Xiao Ci, is compelled to participate. In the competition, heroes from all sides issue challenges; Grandmaster Zhao Chen pushes past his limits and ultimately defeats a fighter from Fusang, winning the bridegroom-selection bout.
Mom, Love Me One More Time
Female-oriented

translations.source: 苏桐生来体弱得了脑瘤，压迫神经导致失明，恶父不救治反将其卖给人贩子，其母许温淑几度寻子，十八年后命运使得母女二人再次相见，可迎接她们的仍是各种艰难险阻
translations.target: Su Tong is born frail and develops a brain tumor; the pressure on her nerves leaves her blind. Her cruel father not only refuses treatment but even sells her to human traffickers. Her mother, Xu Wenshu, searches for her time and again. Eighteen years later, fate brings mother and daughter together once more—yet what awaits them is still a succession of hardships and peril.

translations.source: 被遗忘的星星（消逝的星光）
translations.target: The Forgotten Star (Fading Starlight)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 黎雪发现女儿诺诺被独自留在熄火的车内，生命垂危，而丈夫刘斌却正与情人素素及其子亮亮游玩，拒接电话甚至误导救援。婆婆冷漠，希望孙女出事好让黎雪再孕产子。黎雪焦急寻女，屡遭挫折，甚至误砸他人车，情绪崩溃，这时助理林川传来了找到刘斌车子的消息……
translations.target: Li Xue discovers that her daughter, Nono, has been left alone in a stalled car and is in critical danger, while her husband, Liu Bin, is out having fun with his mistress Susu and Susu’s son Liangliang—refusing to answer calls and even misleading rescuers. Her mother-in-law is cold and indifferent, hoping something will happen to the granddaughter so Li Xue will get pregnant again. Desperate to find her child, Li Xue suffers setback after setback, even mistakenly smashing someone else’s car and breaking down emotionally—until her assistant, Lin Chuan, brings news that Liu Bin’s car has been located…
Mr. Fu’s Abusive Love Addiction (Misplaced Love, Hard to Unravel)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 两年后，顾清雨被冤枉找人玷污傅廷也未婚妻一事出狱，被傅廷也强行带走，本想找两个混混为自己报仇，可于心不忍在中途叫停，并和沈遇喝酒时被他下药，阴差阳错与顾清雨发生了关系，为了报仇让顾家破产清算，恰在此时顾老重病住院，不得已去求傅廷也借钱，而傅廷也为了吸引舒梦出现答应了，借此与顾清雨假结婚发生了一系列相爱相杀的事情
translations.target: Two years later, Gu Qingyu is released from prison after being framed for hiring someone to defile Fu Tingye’s fiancée, only to be forcibly taken away by Fu Tingye. She once considers hiring two thugs for revenge, but her conscience stops her midway. Later, while drinking with Shen Yu, she is drugged, and by a twist of fate ends up sleeping with Fu Tingye. Bent on revenge and determined to drive the Gu family into bankruptcy and liquidation, Fu Tingye presses forward. At this time, Old Master Gu falls gravely ill and is hospitalized; left with no choice, Gu Qingyu begs Fu Tingye for money. Fu agrees—using it as bait to lure Shu Meng into the open—and arranges a sham marriage with Gu Qingyu, triggering a series of love-and-hate entanglements.

translations.source: 女总裁的复仇（复仇女神）
translations.target: The Female CEO’s Revenge (Goddess of Vengeance)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 女主姜婉兮回国后得知姐姐死讯，为了调查姐姐死因，选择封锁消息并且假扮姐姐身份回到婆家查找线索。扮演姐姐身份后，才发现这一家子对姐姐竟是非人待遇，女主决定在查找真凶之时也要严惩这群恶人
translations.target: After returning to China, the heroine Jiang Wanxi learns of her sister’s death. To investigate the cause, she chooses to suppress the news and impersonate her sister as she returns to her sister’s in-laws’ home to look for clues. Only after assuming her sister’s identity does she discover the family’s inhumane treatment of her sister. Jiang Wanxi resolves to punish these villains severely while also hunting down the true culprit.

translations.source: 《回到古代当昏君》（穿越求死路）
translations.target: Return to Ancient Times as a Foolish Emperor (Transmigrating to Seek Death)
Male-oriented

translations.source: 荣宇是勤勤恳恳想要通过做好事成仙的人，穿越到大燕昏君的身上后知道求死也能成仙，便开启了艰难的“求死”之路，在这一路爱上了刺杀他的女主舒亦君，并给昏君的口碑带来了惊人的逆转，成为远近闻名、十里八乡人人夸的一代明君。
translations.target: Rong Yu is a diligent man who hopes to attain immortality through good deeds. After transmigrating into the body of the foolish emperor of Great Yan, he learns that seeking death can also lead to immortality, and thus begins a grueling “road to death.” Along the way, he falls in love with the heroine Shu Yijun, who was sent to assassinate him, and brings about a stunning reversal of the emperor’s reputation—eventually becoming a wise ruler celebrated far and wide.
Qingqiu in the Cold Palace
Female-oriented

translations.source: 在大成皇朝，王皇子盛明轩登基，丞相之女文清秋功不可没，本将册封为后。然而，表妹宁媚儿指控文清秋谋害宁妃，并出示证据，导致文丞相一家被囚，文清秋亦身陷囹圄。面对重重困境，文清秋誓要揭开真相，为家人洗清冤屈。她不仅要面对皇权与阴谋的较量，还要探寻皇室深处的秘密。这是一部充满智慧、勇气与爱情的宫廷大戏，文清秋的命运将如何演变，敬请期待。
translations.target: In the Great Cheng Dynasty, Prince Sheng Mingxuan ascends the throne. The Chancellor’s daughter, Wen Qingqiu, has rendered indispensable service and is poised to be crowned empress. However, her cousin Ning Meier accuses Wen Qingqiu of murdering Consort Ning and presents evidence, resulting in the imprisonment of the Wen family and Wen Qingqiu’s own incarceration. Faced with layered adversity, Wen Qingqiu vows to uncover the truth and clear her family’s name. She must not only contend with imperial power and conspiracies, but also probe the secrets buried deep within the royal house. This is a sweeping palace drama of intelligence, courage, and love—how will Wen Qingqiu’s fate unfold? Stay tuned.

translations.source: 渣男前夫为何跪地求饶
translations.target: Why Is My Scumbag Ex-Husband Kneeling and Begging for Mercy?
Female-oriented

translations.source: 林氏集团老丈人去世，女儿期待女婿出席葬礼，却迟迟未见身影。传言女婿陆长江不参加葬礼，反而去机场接一名女子，引发外界对其不忠的猜测。女儿面对记者的追问，坚定表示信任丈夫，认为他不是这样的人。然而，随着更多证据浮现，女儿与丈夫间的信任出现裂痕。在葬礼现场，女儿情绪激动，质问丈夫为何不参加父亲的葬礼，反而去接别的女人。丈夫试图解释，但未能平息妻子的怒火。妻子决心亲自追问丈夫真相，若他真的背叛了自己，便坚决离婚。同时，围绕丈夫的行为，家庭内部矛盾升级，外界的猜测与质疑也未曾停歇。
translations.target: After the chairman of the Lin Group passes away, his daughter expects her husband to attend the funeral, yet he is nowhere to be seen. Rumors spread that the son-in-law, Lu Changjiang, skipped the funeral to pick up a woman at the airport, sparking suspicions of infidelity. Under reporters’ questioning, the daughter firmly insists she trusts her husband and believes he is not that kind of person. However, as more evidence emerges, cracks form in the couple’s trust. At the funeral, the daughter, overwhelmed with emotion, confronts her husband—why did he miss her father’s funeral only to go meet another woman? He tries to explain, but cannot quell her fury. She resolves to demand the truth in person; if he has truly betrayed her, she will divorce without hesitation. Meanwhile, conflicts within the family escalate, and outside speculation and doubt show no sign of stopping.

translations.source: 风流小神医和四个绝色师姐
translations.target: The Flirtatious Little Miracle Doctor and His Four Stunning Senior Sisters
Male-oriented

translations.source: 神医殿被蛊王攻陷，老殿主失踪，新任殿主叶凡也因重伤失忆流落民间，却又遭未婚妻孔雪背叛跌落高楼，多重刺激下叶凡恢复记忆，但因旧日伤未愈，武力值不足，处处被蛊王势力掣肘。叶凡为了找寻老殿主下落和治疗伤势，带着一纸婚约找上上官家，想借助纯阴之体疗伤，却屡陷阴谋，遭遇迫害
translations.target: The Divine Doctor Hall is overrun by the Gu King; the former hall master disappears, and the newly appointed hall master, Ye Fan, suffers severe injuries, loses his memory, and drifts among the common folk. He is then betrayed by his fiancée Kong Xue and falls from a high-rise. Under repeated shocks, Ye Fan regains his memories, but his old wounds have yet to heal, leaving him short on combat strength and constantly constrained by the Gu King’s forces. To find the missing former hall master and treat his injuries, Ye Fan takes a marriage contract to the Shangguan family, hoping to heal by leveraging a pure yin constitution—only to be repeatedly ensnared in plots and persecuted.

translations.source: 总裁你的闺女被虐惨了（总裁千金劫）
translations.target: CEO, Your Daughter Has Been Abused Miserably (The CEO’s Heiress in Peril)
Female-oriented

translations.source: 江家男子向妻子索要钱财，仅得到十元后不满地咒骂，表示需要三万块钱并声称会再想办法。妻子劝他别再赌博，却遭到丈夫的怒斥和指责，称是家中的女儿导致了江家家底亏空。此时，伟哥到访，江家男子慌忙迎接，伟哥提及他欠下的三万块钱债务，江家男子请求宽限两天，但被伟哥拒绝。伟哥注意到江家男子的妻子貌美，提出不当建议，江家男子竟默许。随后，伟哥又盯上了他们年幼且长相水灵的女儿，提出让女儿抵债，江家男子犹豫后竟表示听从。女儿惊恐呼救，场面危急。此时，有人称呼乔总好，家政人员也打招呼，另一女子得到小兵的消息，表现出惊喜。
translations.target: A man from the Jiang family demands money from his wife. When he receives only ten yuan, he curses in dissatisfaction, insisting he needs 30,000 yuan and claiming he will find a way to get it. His wife urges him to stop gambling, but he angrily berates her and blames their daughter for draining the family’s savings. At that moment, Wei Ge arrives; the man rushes to greet him. Wei Ge brings up the 30,000-yuan debt, and the man asks for two more days, only to be refused. Noticing the wife’s looks, Wei Ge makes an indecent suggestion, and the man shockingly acquiesces. Wei Ge then sets his sights on their young, pretty daughter, proposing that she be used to repay the debt. After hesitating, the man agrees to comply. The terrified daughter cries for help as the situation turns critical. Just then, someone greets “President Qiao,” the domestic staff also offer greetings, and another woman receives news from Xiao Bing and reacts with delight.

translations.source: 《带娃离婚后，首富千金瞒不住了》
translations.target: After Divorcing with a Child, the Billionaire Heiress Can No Longer Hide
Female-oriented

translations.source: 选择离婚带着孩子离开。离婚后，由于某些机缘巧合，她首富千金的身份不再能隐瞒，随之而来的是一系列的变化，比如她可能利用家族的财富和资源开始新的生活，让曾经看不起她的人刮目相看，同时也可能面临着一些新的挑战和情感纠葛。
translations.target: She chooses to divorce and leave with her child. After the divorce, a string of coincidences makes it impossible to keep her identity as the richest family’s heiress hidden any longer. What follows is a series of changes: she may leverage her family’s wealth and resources to start a new life, leaving those who once looked down on her stunned—while also facing new challenges and emotional entanglements.
The Powerful Wife of the Possessive Young Master Wen
Female-oriented

translations.source: 她美丽纤弱，他派无数暗卫保护，却发现众暗卫接不过她一招~
translations.target: She looks beautiful and delicate. He dispatches countless shadow guards to protect her—only to discover that none of them can withstand even a single move from her.

translations.source: 《满级甜诱!在傅爷怀里声色撩人》
translations.target: Max-Level Sweet Seduction! Teasing Master Fu in His Arms
Female-oriented

translations.source: 女明星姜予漾爱慕V神已久，做梦都是V神，而现实中的从未谋面的未婚夫傅以泽，因为爷爷辈的恩情，要求姜予漾跟傅家结姻，可是傅以泽早在一年前就跟沈心柔勾搭在一起，沈心柔靠着傅以泽在娱乐圈如鱼得水，某一天傅以泽见到了路过的姜予漾，对她一见倾心，而姜予漾想方设法取消这门婚事。
translations.target: The female celebrity Jiang Yuyang has admired “V-God” for a long time—she even dreams about him. In reality, her unseen fiancé, Fu Yize, insists on marrying into the Fu family due to an old debt of gratitude between their grandfathers. But Fu Yize has already been involved with Shen Xinrou for a year, and Shen uses him to thrive in the entertainment industry. One day, Fu Yize catches sight of Jiang Yuyang in passing and falls for her at first sight, while Jiang Yuyang tries every possible way to cancel the engagement.
President Shao, Your Wife Went Live to Find a Match Again
Female-oriented

translations.source: 邵太太为了引起邵总的注意，再次去直播相亲，两人之间的爱情故事充满趣味和甜蜜。
translations.target: To catch President Shao’s attention, Mrs. Shao once again goes live to join a matchmaking stream. Their love story is full of humor and sweetness.
The Divine Son-in-Law of Dragon Gate
Male-oriented

translations.source: 醉卧美人膝醒掌大权，谁人不服
translations.target: Drunk, I rest on a beauty’s lap; awake, I hold supreme power—who dares refuse?

translations.source: 《辞职后前总裁对我余情未了》
translations.target: After I Quit, My Former CEO Still Has Feelings for Me
Female-oriented

translations.source: 宋襄是严总的私人秘书负责严总的一切，却发现严总只是把她作为工具弃之如履于是她决定离开，严总没想到前总裁竟开始穷追不舍.
translations.target: Song Xiang is President Yan’s personal secretary, handling everything for him—only to realize he treats her as a disposable tool. She decides to leave, and President Yan never expected that he would become unable to let go and would start pursuing her relentlessly.

translations.source: 顾总的隐婚娇妻是女帝
translations.target: President Gu’s Secret Wife Is a Female Emperor
Male-oriented

translations.source: 女帝穿越现代竟穿成霸道总裁的隱婚娇妻？总裁老公要离婚，女帝却把他当男宠
translations.target: A female emperor transmigrates to the modern world—only to become a domineering CEO’s secretly married wife? The CEO husband wants a divorce, but the empress treats him as her male consort.

translations.source: 救命，魔尊大人把我宠上天
translations.target: Help! The Demon Lord Dotes on Me to the Heavens
Female-oriented

translations.source: 网文作家李蕙娇在许愿时意外召唤出了自己书中的大反派赤弦魔尊厉苍云，厉苍云为回到书中决定为李蕙娇实现愿望，帮她追求她暗恋已久的霸总涂梓浩。然而当霸总真的爱上自己时，李蕙娇才发现自己喜欢的人是厉苍云。
translations.target: Online-fiction writer Li Huijiao accidentally summons the ultimate villain from her own novel—the Chi Xian Demon Lord, Li Cangyun—while making a wish. Determined to return to the book, Li Cangyun decides to fulfill Li Huijiao’s wish and helps her pursue the overbearing CEO Tu Zihao, whom she has long admired in secret. Yet when the CEO truly falls in love with her, Li Huijiao realizes the one she actually loves is Li Cangyun.
Northern Desert Frenzy
Male-oriented

translations.source: 天狼卫首领、北漠狼王沈天君凯旋回归后却发现自己父亲被害，沈氏集团被二叔沈人凤联合三大家族夺走，妻子慕筱也被迫要改嫁给程家大少。狼王沈天君一怒之下以一己之力摧枯拉朽瓦解梁、程、欧阳三大家族，击败二叔夺回集团，为父报仇，并与妻子破镜重圆。
translations.target: After returning in triumph, Shen Tianjun—the leader of the Tianlang Guard and the Wolf King of the Northern Desert—discovers that his father has been murdered. The Shen Group has been seized by his second uncle, Shen Renfeng, who has allied with three major families, and Shen Tianjun’s wife, Mu Xiao, is forced to remarry the eldest son of the Cheng family. Enraged, Shen Tianjun single-handedly crushes the Liang, Cheng, and Ouyang families, defeats his uncle, retakes the group, avenges his father, and reunites with his wife.
President Chi, Your Wife Wants a Divorce
Female-oriented

translations.source: 结婚三年，他却在她的生日当天约会白月光，她当场提出离婚！他却以为她是欲情故纵的把戏，直到他得知她去酒吧点了男人.
translations.target: Married for three years, he dates his “first love” on her birthday, and she demands a divorce on the spot! He assumes it’s just a game of playing hard to get—until he learns she went to a bar and hired a man.
Seeking Pleasure
Female-oriented

translations.source: 大夏国的长公主吴欢，心狠手辣，把持朝政已久，皇帝早已心生不满，预谋刺杀吴欢，而吴欢为皇帝扫清障碍，一切都是为了皇帝，到头来被亲自送给皇帝的刀所杀，她不甘心就这样死去，她的执念带她穿越到了现代她看到了与自己长得一模一样的吴迪，和端王浩炎长相一样的顾浩炎。吴迪是一个神秘编剧，作为《长公主》的编剧与三金影帝顾浩炎结婚，吴迪以为自己嫁给了爱情放弃了事业，实则婚后是冷漠相待，和无尽的等待，吴迪的忍气吞声，却遭到了顾浩炎背叛了吴迪，季雨婷派人羞辱吴迪，导致了吴迪的死亡。
translations.target: Wu Huan, the Grand Princess of Daxia, is ruthless and has long held power over the court. The emperor has grown dissatisfied and plots to assassinate her. Yet Wu Huan clears obstacles for the emperor time and again—everything for his sake—only to be killed in the end by the very blade she personally presented to him. Unwilling to die like this, her obsession carries her into the modern world, where she encounters Wu Di, who looks exactly like her, and Gu Haoyan, who bears the same face as Prince Duan, Haoyan. Wu Di is a mysterious screenwriter. As the writer of “Grand Princess,” she marries Gu Haoyan, a “Triple-Crown” Best Actor winner. Believing she has married for love, Wu Di gives up her career, only to be met after marriage with cold indifference and endless waiting. Her forbearance is repaid with Gu Haoyan’s betrayal; Ji Yuting sends people to humiliate Wu Di, leading to Wu Di’s death.

translations.source: 吴欢的灵魂穿越千年，到了吴迪的身上，获取了吴迪所有的记忆和情感，吴迪和吴欢两个灵魂的交流，双方达成协议，彼此都心怀怨恨，吴迪让吴欢成为她，吴欢势要为伤害过吴迪的人，付出代价。吴迪在这一刻重生了，开启了一系列的报复计划，与顾浩炎进行谈判想要离婚。陆寻凭借《长公主1》，获得了最佳男主角，无意中救下了中了迷药的吴迪，陆寻曾经的恋人，背叛了陆寻选择了顾浩炎，最后嫁给了顾浩炎的大哥(顾浩淼)。陆寻和吴迪联手撕渣男渣女，曾经伤害过他们的人，让他们通通付出代价。
translations.target: Wu Huan’s soul travels a thousand years and enters Wu Di’s body, inheriting all of Wu Di’s memories and emotions. Through communication between the two souls, they reach an agreement: both harbor deep resentment. Wu Di allows Wu Huan to become “her,” and Wu Huan vows to make everyone who has harmed Wu Di pay the price. At that moment, Wu Di is reborn and launches a series of revenge plans, negotiating with Gu Haoyan for a divorce. Lu Xun wins Best Actor thanks to “Grand Princess 1” and, by chance, rescues Wu Di when she has been drugged. Lu Xun’s former lover once betrayed him to choose Gu Haoyan and ultimately married Gu Haoyan’s elder brother (Gu Haomiao). Lu Xun and Wu Di join forces to tear down the scumbag man and woman alike, making all those who once hurt them pay in full.
Jiangxia Journey · The Gold-Medal Duo
Male-oriented

translations.source: 盛子浩盛世集团的继承人，因不学无术被放养到乌龙泉，并要求三个月内带着乌龙泉振兴发展，否则就不能得到盛家资产。在阴差阳错下带领乌龙泉发展的人被错认成了黄旺，于是在黄旺盛子浩和乌龙泉的村民们之间展开了新的故事
translations.target: Sheng Zihao, the heir of Shengshi Group, is sent away to Wulongquan for being good-for-nothing and is ordered to revitalize and develop Wulongquan within three months—otherwise he will lose his claim to the Sheng family assets. Through a string of mishaps, the person leading Wulongquan’s development is mistakenly believed to be Huang Wang, and a new story unfolds among Huang Wang, Sheng Zihao, and the villagers of Wulongquan.
Hegemonic Qin
Male-oriented

translations.source: 设计师陈羽一朝穿越至秦朝，没想到落地就被抓去修长城，陈羽叫苦连天之际忽然听闻始皇嬴政病重，能替其治病者有重赏，陈羽揭下皇榜却被赵高的人追杀，幸亏他逃进大皇子扶苏的宫殿才得留一命，觐见始皇，但赵高心怀毒计意欲让陈羽与方士斗法，害死陈羽，却没想到陈羽精通数理化，在打脸方士的同时，还巧妙的将身上的消炎药献了出去……
translations.target: Designer Chen Yu transmigrates to the Qin Dynasty, only to be seized the moment he arrives and forced to build the Great Wall. As he laments his fate, he suddenly hears that the First Emperor, Ying Zheng, is gravely ill, and that anyone who can cure him will be richly rewarded. Chen Yu tears down the imperial notice, but is hunted by Zhao Gao’s men. He survives only by fleeing into Crown Prince Fusu’s palace. Summoned to an audience with the First Emperor, Chen Yu then becomes the target of Zhao Gao’s vicious scheme: Zhao intends to pit him in a contest of “magic arts” against Daoist adepts to get him killed. Zhao Gao never expects Chen Yu to be well-versed in math, physics, and chemistry; while humiliating the adepts, Chen Yu also cleverly presents the anti-inflammatory medicine he carries…
